text: Ci 6.15 Lom 12.5, 1 Ko 12.27, Ef 4.12, 4.15-16, 5.30 igɨlaŋ uami. Naludɨ hadipɨlɨ agɨlaŋ Jisasɨ Kɨlaisɨ dɨ hɨcɨ human hadipɨlɨ me hɨniavɨlalɨ uami. Hameŋ sadaŋ viaŋ iadɨ hadipɨlɨ Jisasɨ Kɨlaisɨ dɨ hɨcɨ human hadipɨlɨ me hɨnilalɨ nagadɨ via uavɨla hɨbɨ pɨlɨ hɨsɨŋ iamɨgali hula lusɨŋ sɨbɨlɨ vimagaŋ uami. Ha hɨma sɨbaŋ uami.
